title: Circulation of the Arizona Republic 2018
summary: This statistic shows the Circulation of Day Circulation of the 2018 Arizona presidential 2018 , as of Arizona Republic , 2018 .
As of Arizona Republic , 2018 Sunday had approximately 378602 % Day Circulation .
gold: This statistic shows the daily circulation of the Arizona Republic newspaper in the United States in 2018.
The newspaper had a Sunday circulation of just under 380 thousand in that year .
